src:
O2 Priority presale tickets to see Westlife in Falkirk and Inverness are on sale today
If you're on the O2 network you can access the ticket presale to see the Irish band perform in Scotland next summer
06 Nov 2019, 08:11 by Linda Howard
Presales of tickets to see Westlife perform in Falkirk and Inverness next year as part of their 'Stadiums in the Summer' tour started on Tuesday.
Fans who pre-ordered the Irish band's new album ‘Spectrum’ on any format gained unique access to the presale through Ticketmaster on Tuesday.
But for those that missed out, 9am on Wednesday sees the start of the O2 Priority presale .
If you're on the O2 mobile network, getting presale tickets is easy - follow our simple steps below and you'll be able to buy your Westlife tickets as soon as they dorp.

How to set up O2 Priority


Download the O2 Priority app to your mobile (iOS and Android)
Open the app and enter your O2 phone number when prompted
O2 will send you a text with your activation code
Enter the code in the app
Browse O2 Priority tickets

You can order presale tickets on the app or on the O2 Priority website here .
And if that seems like too much hassle for a Wednesday morning - just find a friend that already has O2 Priority access and ask them order for you!

Get tickets to see Westlife in Falkirk here


Get tickets to see Westlife in Inverness here




 
The ‘ Stadiums in the Summer ’ announcement follows the phenomenal success of Westlife's remarkable comeback and comes as the band prepares to release their brand new album ‘Spectrum’ on November 15.
Nicky Byrne, Shane Filan, Mark Feehily and Kian Egan will perform at Falkirk Stadium , Grangemouth and Tulloch Caledonian Stadium , Inverness next June, with tickets going on general sale at 9am on Friday, November 8.
Westlife presale tickets for Falkirk and Inverness
Wednesday, November 6 - 9am


O2 Priority

Tickets: Ticketaster l Buy here

Thursday, November 7 - 9am


Gigs in Scotland 

Tickets: Ticketaster l Buy here

Thursday, November 7 - 9am


Live Nation  

Tickets: Ticketaster l Buy here


Tickets go on general sale at 9am on Friday, November 8 through Ticketmaster here .




Stadiums in the Summer Tour

19 June 2020 - Norwich - Carrow Road
21 June 2020 - Peterborough - The Weston Homes Stadium
26 June 2020 - Cardiff - Cardiff City Stadium
27 June 2020 - Falkirk - The Falkirk Stadium
28 June 2020 - Inverness -  Inverness Caledonian Stadium
03 July 2020 - Southampton -  The Ageas Bowl
04 July 2020 - Plymouth -  Home Park
05 July 2020 - Colwyn Bay - Stadium Zipworld
10 July 2020 - Hull - Hull College Craven Park Stadium
11 July 2020 - Colchester - Castle Park
12 July 2020 - Gloucester - Kingsholm Stadium
16 July 2020 - Leicester - Fischer County Ground
17 July 2020 - Kent - The Spitfire Ground
18 July 2020 - Durham - Emirates Riverside
22 August 2020 - London - Wembley Stadium
